comments.html:
ok nice summary. But misses one, I think, crucial aspect of it all from a user perspective. 3G has issues with latency and HSPDA has issues with latency but much improved on its predecessor.

afaik its to do with setting up the dedicated radio channels (and bearers).. This is trying to be solved by keeping the dedicated channels & bearers alive all the time to avoid the set-up time.
comments.name: bad designer
